string-array.name: top_tips
string-array.item: "You can only see files to select for upload that are acceptable to upload on your server. If you wish to upload videos, be sure to alter your server config.inc.php file to include $conf['upload_form_all_types'] = true; rather than false"
If an upload just won\'t succeed, try using the preference in the app settings upload page to clear any residual failed uploads from the server
Error always occurs when trying to update tags - \"You are not allowed to delete tags\" - Ensure users can both add and delete tags (server plugin setting)
Share files from a different app with this app to add them to the upload screen ready to go to your current server
Long click on an image (either thumbnail or slideshow item) that has failed to load in order to retrieve it again
Long click on an album to delete that album and all content
Long click on an album image to enable bulk selection of images for an action
When viewing any image in the slideshow, long click to rotate / change image size shown / allow further zooming
You can zoom into an image when viewing in a slideshow by drawing two fingers together or apart on the screen
When logged in as an administrator, before handing your device to a friend to view your photos, engage the application lock feature to prevent inadvertent changes being made to your gallery
Once you have viewed an entire video, if local file caching is enabled, it is possible to save that video to your downloads folder
Long click delete button on a \'file for upload\' to delete all files to be uploaded (when job is not in progress)
If images are slow to load, check that your server automatically generates the size used by this app when they are uploaded

string-array.name: planned_releases
string-array.item: "Bugfix: - fix intermittent but incorrect HTTP 401 errors possibly linked to cached response revalidation Changes: - Possibly: - Removal of all or most adverts in favour of a free trial period followed by a subscription based payment model - Verify the current login status to ensure album and image lists are always correct - Verify support for upload to older servers (e.g. piwigo.com - version 2.8a) - The ability to delete an album, but not its contents (creating orphans) - Orphan file management - Investigate adding support for coloured tag plugin - Improved Animated gif support (large file streaming) - Possibly (Paid App only): - The random photos idea implemented on the piwigo web UI - Support for user comments - Notify user of server updates that are available - Support for editing EXIF and other image metadata formats - Add preference to allow showing/hiding the EXIF etc fields of or not of interest - Screen cast of some kind to allow mirror of device on a larger screen - Anything Else: - Please email me (there is an email link in the navigation bar) to request things you need or want that this app doesn't yet do"

string-array.name: release_history
string-array.item: "Changes: - Removed support for android versions earlier than 4.4. Sorry if this affects you, but unless you can provide a compelling reason, it won't come back. The number picker is buggy below this version and I've spent too long trying to fix it already. Bugfix: - Crash on upload complete if upload page no longer visible. - Crash on navigation between albums using title bar"
"Bugfix - Crash caused by app expecting more permissions for shared folder than necessary and provided"

"Bugfix: - Crashes on upload reported by user - Crash on redisplay of a slideshow viewed for an album since viewed. I tried to make the back button behaviour more logical, but alas I feear it has gotten worse (especially since it has exposed this issue)."
"Bugfix: - Folder permissions not correctly accepted when offered"
"Bugfix: - Crash on navigation to the gallery from upload or settings if the last open page of the gallery was a slideshow"

"Bugfix: - A number of bug fixes for crashes surrounding the recent overhaul of file handling code Changes: - Vast improvement to the performance of the file selection for upload screens - Seamless support for selecting files in apps that do not provide required file permissions - paid app: Enabled hardware acceleration across the app - paid app: Enabled use of the folder/file selection task by other apps (please report any issues)"
"Bugfix: - App crash during or after an upload"

"Bugfix: - Issues with crashes after upload completes - progress for individual file upload not shown - crash on rotate device with upload screen shown - unable to scroll page up to view upload button on upload settings tab"
"Bugfix: - Lots of niggles causing crashes have been rectified - The select upload destination album page is no longer transparent"

"Changes: - Major rewrite of all the theme related code to radically simplify and correct colors across android versions - Changed the theme to a day/night one so it is user configurable (in night, no screens have white background). - added support for Uri and scoped storage: - share files easily - select files using the system file selector or the in app one - deleting files after upload is now working again - check files are unique prior to upload - this is now harder, so it takes a little longer - The in app file selector is relatively slow to load folders containing lots of files - limitations in android APIs at present - when compressing videos, you can strip the audio or video stream off if wanted to create an m4a or m4v file (mp4 file extension added if that's all your server allows). - Drawer menu available from the upload screen to allow you to jump to gallery, or settings - The app is ready for implementation of code to warn you while selecting photos of ones you've uploaded previously. Bugfix: - Upload page retains files when adding new files from system selector and or navigation to in the main gallery - The video compression code has been radically overhauled. It shouldn't freeze and give up on any videos now. (Let me know if it does) - Rewrite of large areas to remove potential memory leaks - Should be much less prone to crash on old versions of Android (pre Lollipop)"
"Changes: - Corrected remaining theme issue for dialogs Bugfix: - Server Uri path fragment incorrectly converted to lowercase resulting in 404 error"

"Changes: - Added a button to view hidden password in preferences - Moved to MaterialComponents based theme (there are some minor changes) - Hide most connection preferences by default - click to expand them to access the rest - moved some upload preferences to advanced section Bugfix: - Added a optional URI encoding for photo retrieval (uses existing uri encoding connection preference) - Stopped warning about missing tags coming up to say 0 were missing"

"Changes: - Added the option to select a download folder in app preferences Bugfix: - Stop warnings showing for slideshow auto-drive when it is disabled. - Select currently visible file when showing file download dialog"

"Bugfix: - Preference upgrade process fixed for people upgrading a several versions old version off the app to the latest available - Upload job status file not saving - Upload job (incorrectly) started while video still being written to by device camera"
"Bugfix: - Several little bug fixes Change: - Enabled support for Android 11 - Please let me know if you can't see files to upload any more"

"Change: - Changes to the app preferences page - Added new preference for forcing one time user hints to be shown again - paid app: Added an auto drive feature on the slideshow - new setting in the slideshow section of gallery preferences"
"Change: - Allow download or sharing of multiple files after selecting them in the album view"
"Change: - Free version: removed all interstitial adverts for a couple of months so its use as more than a trial of the paid version is tolerable"
"Bugfix: - opted out of scoped storage for now - allows app to see files for upload again on android 10"
"Bugfix: - videos sometimes only recognised as photos depending on the case of server url entered in connection settings"
"Bugfix: - opted out of scoped storage for now - allows app to see files for upload again on android 10"
"Changes: - page title clickable - navigate to parent album Bugfix: - Album sort order not always correct - translations possibly not selected in optimum order automatically."

"Changes: - Added preference to control display of message showing image size loaded from server Bugfix: - Refresh album view immediately after changing resource or child album sort order - fix bug with general album sorting - fixed access to slideshow when child albums are squashed (by touching albums header) - Possible bug where some connection settings changes (such as use basic authentication) wouldn't be fully used until next app restart"

"Bugfix: - Cancelling a file upload and leaving upload page before cancellation reported causes crash - paid app: crash using russian on automatic upload job configuration page - paid app: Updating tags list for a resource where at least one tag previously selected no longer exists causes crash (now warn user and remove them) - paid app: App can crash when selecting destination album for auto upload job - paid app: selecting the root album as destination album for auto upload job displays first album name as selected album (incorrectly) - paid app: Note: I'm not clear that selecting the gallery root as an upload destination is ever sensible, but in case it is in some circumstances, it is allowed."

"Changes: - New gallery preference to allow forcing language used within the app - New Advanced Server Connection Preference - Enable URI encoding of resource URIs Bugfix: - number picker preferences accept value on dialog close - PiwigoClientWsExt plugin correctly named in user message - Corrected a few translations"

"Changes: - Allow passthrough of audio as compression option - Enabled compression for non 'audio/raw' mime audio streams - Add option to strip the audio track from video Bugfix: - Stop video compression if it is deleted from upload during compression - Stop video being uploaded if it is deleted from upload during compression - tidy the upload progress display for individual files"

"Bugfix: - video compression failure - last upload job is re-run (no damage) on running next upload - requiring you to click upload again to get new job to run - slow display of images when scrolling"
"Changes: - New preference in gallery settings to disable navigation button and or status bar auto hide function - Only show which image sizes are being shown once unless it changes"

"Changes: - Added reload contents button to file selection page - removed the (paid) suffix from app name - Show path or indication of it for destination upload album Bugfix: - Slideshow was missing last item in album - Delete item in Slideshow - blank page"
"Changes: - Increased arbitrary app supported max upload file size to 10GB - Updated dependent library versions"
"Bugfix: - Corrections to image load error handling - Correction to fix minor bug in file upload process"

"Bugfix: - Improvements to app stability - edit mode closed after image details updated Changes: - (pro only) View upload status details including errors for automatic jobs - on each automatic upload job config page"
"Bugfix: - Slideshow (full screen image view) now works again. My Sincere apologies. - Russian translations for preferences added"
"Bugfix: - Connection cleanup now works again - Setting resource rating in Russian Locale now works again"

"Changes: - The download for files now occurs in a rudimentary queue and is managed at an app level. However, you must still currently keep the app open for then download to continue. Bugfix: - Download of files now works where server does not report file size - Files added to file upload screen are now shown again (were initially invisible) - Other assorted bugs"
